item.title: ELECTION INTERFERENCE IS BAD...Unless it is By Your Chinese Friends, Of Course & the Trans-Cult is Argument is DESTROYED by Science [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 18, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew take a look at the recent inquiry into CCP election interference in Canada's 2019 and 2021 general elections. While the Liberals were warned a multiplicity of times by CSIS, the Trudeau Regime did nothing and said nothing, and our Prime Minister couldn't even be bothered to read the briefings. Oh, and the guys show how every longitudinal piece of scientific data and all common sense flies in the face of the healthfulness of disfiguring human beings for the sake of a delusion. Yet, the RAINBOW CULT MAFIA presses forward with the help of our insane government. 

[Segment 1] - CCP Election Interference:
"Trudeau Briefed on Alleged Interference Dong Riding Document" | Global News https://globalnews.ca/news/10410957/trudeau-briefed-alleged-interference-dong-riding-document;
"China Interfered in 2019, 2021 Canadian Federal Elections: Canadian Security Intelligence Service" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/china-interfered-in-2019-2021-canadian-federal-elections-canadian-security-intelligence-service?utm_content=;
"CSIS Briefing for PMO in 2023 Says China Interfered in Both 2019 and 2021 Federal Elections" | The Globe and Mail https://www.theglobeandmail.com/politics/article-csis-briefing-for-pmo-in-2023-says-china-interfered-in-both-2019-and;
"Key Takeaways: Election Interference Inquiry" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/15/key-takeaways-election-interference-inquiry;

[Segment 2] - Trans Insanity Presses on Despite Being Overwhelmingly DEBUNKED:
"Children Socially Transition Face Grave Psychological Risks" | The Telegraph https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2024/04/06/children-socially-transition-face-grave-psychological-risks;
"Final Report: Independent Review of Children’s Social Care" | Cass Independent Review https://cass.independent-review.uk/home/publications/final-report;
"Woke British Columbia Teacher Claims She Is in Danger After Being Exposed for Indoctrinating Students in Gender Ideology" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/woke-british-columbia-teacher-claims-she-is-in-danger-after-being-exposed-for-indoctrinating-students-in-gender-ideology?utm_content=;
"Levy: Government Funded Opposing Gender Ideology" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/09/levy-government-funded-opposing-gender-ideology;

[Segment 3] - Interview w/Greg Lawrie from Pro Fleet Care
Pro Fleet Care Website: https://profleetcare.com/;

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 04/16/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ April 16, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

Episode Resources:
"Massive Cancer Deaths Study Vindicates My Warnings Over COVID Boosters" | The Conservative Woman https://www.conservativewoman.co.uk/massive-cancer-deaths-study-vindicates-my-warnings-over-covid-boosters;
"Dr. Scott Atlas on Why We Were Forced to Jab and Mask" | PragerU https://www.prageru.com/video/dr-scott-atlas-on-why-we-were-forced-to-jab-and-mask;
"Trudeau Gov't Still Receiving COVID Shots While Throwing Away $1.5 Billion Worth of Expired Jabs" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeau-govt-still-receiving-covid-shots-while-throwing-away-1-5-billion-worth-of-expired-jabs;
"New Papers Completely Undermine the So-Called Settled Science on Manmade Global Warming" | The Epoch Times https://www.theepochtimes.com/epochtv/new-papers-completely-undermine-the-so-called-settled-science-on-manmade-global-warming-alex-newman-5512688;
"Research Article: Estimating the Benefits of Climate Policy Using the Weather Research and Forecasting Model" | American Meteorological Society https://journals.ametsoc.org/view/journals/apme/62/8/JAMC-D-22-0122.1.xml;
"Research Article: Ongoing Impact of COVID-19 Pandemic on Global Food Security" | IOP Science https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1674-4527/acf18e;
"Research Article: National Assessment of the COVID-19 Response of Bangladesh, Ethiopia, Myanmar, Nigeria, Tanzania, and Vietnam" | MDPI https://www.mdpi.com/2225-1154/11/9/179;
"PBO: 1.3 Million Homes by 2030" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/13/pbo-1-3-million-homes-2030;
"Quadriplegic Man Chose MAID" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/14/quadriplegic-man-chose-maid;
"It's the End of the World, and the Church Is Doing Just Fine" | Western Standard https://www.westernstandard.news/opinion/parker-its-the-end-of-the-world-and-the-church-is-doing-just-fine/53796;
